about_the_game:
IMPORTANT TIP

The beta test version only supports Chinese, but other languages will be added when the game is officially released. Interested friends are welcome to add the game to wishlist. Thank you for your understanding and support!

Exciting doomsday survival experience!

  • You will adventure and explore in a lost town full of zombies, scavenge materials, and fight all the time

  • You will build your own exclusive base, grow various crops, gradually become stronger, and eventually defeat stronger enemies

Challenge various BOSSES!

Each BOSS in the game has a unique attack mechanism. Understand and overcome it, or simply charge forward if you like

Eliminate the powerful corpse nest!

Catch zombies to work for you

Juicing: Squeeze dry monsters, animals, and even NPCs!

Chopping trees, mining: Get rid of boring work and explore the decayed doomsday!

Generating electricity: Enter the electrical age!

The night is fansinating, but also more dangerous!

A zombie tide may break out at night, but at the same time, you will also obtain the materials and props rewards brought by the zombie tide


Act as a leader and lead up to 30 followers to fight together!

The followers can freely use the powerful weapons you modified

The followers can be upgraded and strengthened in battle. Let them use different weapons to determine their growth direction


Super large map for you to explore!

You will explore 8 major areas such as Nightmare Barracks, Corrupted Hive, Bone-chilling Snowfield, etc. Each area contains different game mechanisms, special materials, and function unlocks, as well as many special BOSS battles

Be careful of the monsters wandering everywhere!

Desert, snowfield and other wilderness maps, temper your survival skills!

Each area will have different climate and environmental characteristics, different challenge mechanisms, and special enemy types
Each area will have specific BOSS challenges. What you will conquer is not only the harsh nature, but also the decayed monsters of the doomsday

Dance for everyone :D


Rich and interesting combat skills

Weapon modification

The game allows modification of various weapons, adding various components, and crazily increasing the damage of weapons. Equipping the entire combat team with super-strong modified weapons is one of the key factors for achieving victory in battles

Random modifiers

Player characters can equip up to 15 accessory items, which will greatly change the gameplay experience.

Rich survival experience

  • Real-time weather such as rain and wind, real-time temperature system, simulate wilderness survival
  • Make workbenches, boxes, walls, chop trees, mine, fight monsters, and experience the fun of traditional survival games

Easy to get started

  • The game has built-in interesting and easy tutorial tasks, making it easy to get started and play
  • The main interface will remind you of what you can do currently, and you will quickly become familiar with various mechanisms unconsciously
  • Automatically pick up objects, automatically aim at enemies, and even players with poor hand-eye coordination can enjoy the game. (It also supports enabling manual mouse aiming)

Modern pixel rendering effect

  • Perfect pixel rendering
  • Real-time shadow: Use 3D technology to simulate 2D rendering, achieving a more immersive real-time shadow effect
  • Pixel scaling: Pixel graphics are no longer tiring to the eyes, and can be zoomed in or out as needed

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoon-style bloody scenes of zombie killing and zombie disintegration.

short_description: Anomaly has invaded our homeland! Let's recruit followers, and defeat these monsters! Build our home, cultivate fields and raise livestock, explore and scavenge, and even tame zombies! Uncover the truth of the anomaly invasion and save our homeland!
